SEARCH
Module makao
Package makao.server

Class ServerGame

java.lang.Object
makao.server.ServerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ServerGame extends Object implements Runnable
The ServerGame class is responsible for handling the state of a game of Makao on the server side. It implements the Runnable interface, which allows it to be run in a separate thread.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the game in a separate thread.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • playMakao

      public void playMakao(ServerPlayer[] players)
      The playMakao method is responsible for managing the turns of players in the Makao game. It sets the turn of the next player and checks if the last card played was a king of spades and if so, changes the turn to the previous player. It also checks if the current player is a winner and if so, ends the game for all players.
      Parameters:
      players -

    • closeGame

      public void closeGame()
      The closeGame method is responsible for ending the game and sending a message to all players that the game has ended. It also sets the relevant fields for the players and the game to indicate that the game is no longer in progress.
